item.title: My First Post
item.author: Author
item.description: I wasn’t into paying Squarespace to maintain a website, so I went with GitHub Pages and Hugo! It seems like it’ll work. I already have a personal domain. I had a very productive day on Friday. I was told that I “looked very relaxed” after completing my tasks that day. I need productive days more often and in order to experience them, I’m going to apply for a job after this summer job with school will be over.
